query.statement: SELECT (SELECT NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 M012 WHERE M012.MANDT = BS.MANDT AND M012.LIFNR = BS.BS201_GNO ) NAME1 ,BS201_CDT ,BS201_RDT ,BS201_SEQ ,BS201_SIR ,BS201_PST -- ,(SELECT CCSB1EPN FROM SAPHEE.ZTBCSB1 BC WHERE BC.MANDT = BS.MANDT AND BC.CCSB1EMP = BS.BS201_CID) BS201_CID ,BS.BS201_CID ,BS201_DEV ,BS201_GNM ,BS201_SPT ,BS201_TEL ,BS201_ZIP ,BS201_AD1 ,BS201_AD2 ,BS201_EAM ,BS201_FCD ,BS201_FRT ,BS201_MCD ,BS201_MRT ,BS201_LCD ,BS201_LRT ,BS201_LDT ,BS201_T01 ,BS201_T02 ,BS201_T03 ,BS201_T04 ,BS201_T05 ,BS201_RMK ,0 BS201_QTY ,0 BS201_OAM ,0 BS201_RAT ,BS201_PID ,BS201_GBN ,BS201_AGB ,CASE WHEN BS201_YST = '' THEN 'A0' ELSE BS201_YST END BS201_YST ,BS201_USE ,VALUE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZBST203 B WHERE B.MANDT = BS.MANDT AND B.BS203_AYM = BS.BS201_AYM AND B.BS203_ASQ = BS.BS201_ASQ),0) CHK_203 FROM SAPHEE.ZBST201 BS WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND BS201_GNO = #GNO# AND BS201_RDT = #RDT# AND BS201_SEQ = #SEQ# AND BS201_SIR = #SIR# WITH UR
